TextView.android:text: Alert, forecast, and graphic data are pulled from the National Weather Service's public API. There are 122 offices around the country that are staffed 24/7 to provide local weather forecasts and warning services. Their work is the backbone for this app.

Icons are provided by graphic designers from The Noun Project.
